version_description:
Hi there!
Meet the new application for animated story creating - Dazzle!
This application is a must-have if you want to create unique stories that will catch attention and attract new followers to your account. Inside the application you will find everything that you need to make your stories catchy: 80+ animated and static templates, bright fonts, creative filters and much more. Create and share memories that last with Dazzle!
Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

- Performance and stability improvements
Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Boo! Ghostly Greetings!
We've prepared a new Halloween theme pack.
Amaze your followers with Dazzle!
Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hello! Ready for our dazzling update?

In this version we’ve brought you the following:
- Animated templates support video content. Make your stories even more catchy!
- It is possible to edit text on “Business” collection templates. Customize them all!
- New animated and static templates are coming!
Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Wow! A special update is waiting for you:

- A new set of Christmas templates to get the true spirit of winter holidays!
Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hey!

Create stories that stand out! We’ve improved the app a little and now it is easier to amaze your followers.
Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hey! All you need is love and romantic templates!

Our new Valentine's Day themed collection is already here. Give it a try!
Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Thanks for using Dazzle! This release brings technical improvements to make it even easier to amaze your followers.

Also, don't forget about our Romantic Collection that will bring new flavors to your Valentine's Day stories.

We are grateful for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Great news! A redesigned edition of filters is waiting for you in the latest Dazzle update.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hey! We have a lot to share in this update:
- New feature added! Save your time and add your favorite templates to “Favorites”.
- New cool templates added.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Meet our Easter templates together with performance improvements! Stay safe and stay connected!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Fantastic news! We've added 1,700,000+ free images that you can use in your stories. Go give them a try!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com

Woohoo! We’ve added a whole bunch of new templates and categories. Try all of them, find your favorites, and let us know how you like them!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com

Hey!
Create stories that stand out! We’ve improved the app a little and now it is easier to amaze your followers.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Are you fond of TikTok? Cause if you are, there is some great news for you! Now you can share your edited videos directly to one of the world's favorite social networks. Don't think twice, create something cool right now!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com

Want to add sparkles to your photos or videos? Or maybe the VHS effects? We’ve designed 20 animated overlays to pump up your stories! Be the first to check them out!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Get prepared for the upcoming holiday with Dazzle! Collect memorable photos from the Independence Day with our exclusive holiday templates.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

An update you’ve been asking for! STICKERS! Mix more color in your stories with our exclusive stickers.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Performance improvements you won’t necessarily notice that will definitely enhance your experience with the app.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Woohoo! We have a lot to share in this update:
- New feature added - GIFs! Use Giphy animated sticker collections for an exciting vibe.
- Plenty of templates to match your taste. Go see which ones you like better.

Also, follow us on Instagram for more ideas @dazzle_story_editor!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com

The new spook-takular Halloween collection is out! Create a festive atmosphere in a wink with Dazzle Halloween templates. Dress up and have fun!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

WOW news, everyone!
An automatic resizing for different social media feeds is now available in Dazzle. Resize your stories to 1:1, 4:5, and 2:3 formats. All the template’s elements will be rearranged and saved.
Give your feed a special feel!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Ready to step up your social media stories? Starting now, we'll be releasing new templates on the daily. More categories, more stories, more stickers, and more highlights! All ready to take your brand to the next level. Check the app daily for new templates.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Make stories in one tap! Literally!
We've added autogenerated templates category, which uses pictures straight from your camera roll! Making stories and posts is quicker than ever!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.
